post_title: My first post. T206 Evers Broad Leaf 460
post_content: Hey everyone. Warchiefcards on IG and Ryan Thomas on Facebook here. My first post on here. Will have this one and some other rare back HOFers with me at national and will post them as we get closer but wanted to post something on my first day on the site. Only 2 graded with psa (both 2s).  My ask will be 22k
